text.description:
{Pendant of Downfall}

Worn about the neck, this item decreases enemy's Morale by 2.
text.event: You visit the jeweler's shop. You land your eyes on a bracelet, but the shopkeeper immediately warns you that it is cursed. You fear no curses, and put the bracelet on immediately. The bracelet vanishes in a flash. Enraged, you are about to kill the shopkeeper, but he offers you Pendant of Downfall in return. You agree.
text.name: Pendant of Downfall
